payload.title: EventBus Integration Tests - 12 EARS Cross-Adapter Tests
payload.description: Implement comprehensive EARS integration tests for EventBus covering cross-adapter event flow (EARS-1 to EARS-7) and error handling & resilience (EARS-8 to EARS-12). Test complete task workflows, adapter coordination, performance under load, and error isolation.
payload.notes: 12 EARS integration tests implemented covering: complete task creation workflow simulation, task status change coordination across adapters, cycle hierarchy events, feedback blocking workflow with task pausing, system daily tick monitoring, high-frequency event performance, event ordering in complex workflows, adapter failure isolation, subscription cleanup, and multi-adapter coordination scenarios.
